name: Kothophed, Soul Hoarder
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a permanent owned by another player is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

name: Thriving Moor
oracle_text:
Thriving Moor enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Moor enters the battlefield, choose a color other than black.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.

name: Demon's Grasp
oracle_text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

name: Inner Demon
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and is a Demon in addition to its other types.
When Inner Demon enters the battlefield, all non-Demon creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

name: Demon's Disciple
oracle_text: When Demon's Disciple enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.

name: Conductor of Cacophony
oracle_text:
Conductor of Cacophony enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Conductor of Cacophony: It deals 1 damage to each other creature and each player.

name: Disciple of Perdition
oracle_text:
When Disciple of Perdition dies, choose one. If you have exactly 13 life, you may choose both.
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Exile target opponent's graveyard. That player loses 1 life.

name: Takenuma Bleeder
oracle_text: Whenever Takenuma Bleeder attacks or blocks, you lose 1 life if you don't control a Demon.

name: Fetid Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
{B}: Fetid Imp gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

name: Soulcage Fiend
oracle_text: When Soulcage Fiend dies, each player loses 3 life.
